comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-47D serial 42-75187 (coded B7-O) of the 374th Fighter Squadron, 361st FG ended up on its back in a forced landing due to engine failure with LT James M. Norman, Jr at the controls on 14 January 1944. He was KIA three months later in another P-47, 22 April 1944 (MACR 4333).
